org.fujion.component

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.component.BaseComponent
      • org.fujion.component.BaseUIComponent
        • org.fujion.component.Window
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisable, IElementIdentifier, INamespace, IClientTransform

    @Component(tag="window",
           widgetClass="Window",
           content=AS_CHILD,
           parentTag="*",
           childTag=@Component.ChildTag(value="*"),
           description="A window component with a title bar and maximize/minimize/close buttons.")
public class Window
extends BaseUIComponent
implements INamespace
    A window component with a title bar and maximize/minimize/close buttons. May be used in modal, popup, or inline modes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Window.CloseAction
      Action upon window closure.
      static class  Window.Mode
      Possible display modes for a window.
      static class  Window.Position
      Placement of window in view port when first displayed.
      static class  Window.Size
      Size state for a window.

      • isClosable

        @Component.PropertyGetter(value="closable",
                          description="True if the window is closable. A window that is closable has an icon that, when clicked, triggers a close event.")
public boolean isClosable()
        Returns true if the window is closable. A window that is closable has an icon that, when clicked, triggers a close event.
        Returns:
        True if the window is closable.

      • setClosable

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="closable",
                          defaultValue="false",
                          description="True if the window is closable. A window that is closable has an icon that, when clicked, triggers a close event.")
public void setClosable(boolean closable)
        Set to true to make the window closable. A window that is closable has an icon that, when clicked, triggers a close event.
        Parameters:
        closable - If true, the window is closable.
        See Also:
        onCanClose

      • isSizable

        @Component.PropertyGetter(value="sizable",
                          description="The window\'s sizable property. A window that is sizable has borders that may be dragged to change its dimensions.")
public boolean isSizable()
        Returns the window's sizable property. A window that is sizable has borders that may be dragged to change its dimensions. If the mode is INLINE, this property has no effect.
        Returns:
        The window's sizable property.

      • setSizable

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="sizable",
                          defaultValue="false",
                          description="The window\'s sizable property. A window that is sizable has borders that may be dragged to change its dimensions.")
public void setSizable(boolean sizable)
        Sets the window's sizable property. A window that is sizable has borders that may be dragged to change its dimensions. If the mode is INLINE, this property has no effect.
        Parameters:
        sizable - The window's sizable property.

      • isMovable

        @Component.PropertyGetter(value="movable",
                          description="If true, the window may be moved to a new position by dragging its title bar.")
public boolean isMovable()
        Returns whether the window may be moved to a new position by dragging its title bar. If the mode is INLINE, this property has no effect.
        Returns:
        If true, the window may be moved to a new position by dragging its title bar.

      • setMovable

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="movable",
                          defaultValue="true",
                          description="If true, the window may be moved to a new position by dragging its title bar.")
public void setMovable(boolean movable)
        Sets whether the window may be moved to a new position by dragging its title bar. If the mode is INLINE, this property has no effect.
        Parameters:
        movable - If true, the window may be moved to a new position by dragging its title bar.

      • isMaximizable

        @Component.PropertyGetter(value="maximizable",
                          description="True if the window may be maximized.")
public boolean isMaximizable()
        Returns true if the window may be maximized. A window that is maximizable has an icon that, when clicked, causes a modal or popup window to be resized to fill the view port. Clicking the icon again restores the window to its original size and position.
        Returns:
        True if the window is maximizable.

      • setMaximizable

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="maximizable",
                          defaultValue="false",
                          description="True if the window may be maximized.")
public void setMaximizable(boolean maximizable)
        Sets whether the window may be maximized. A window that is maximizable has an icon that, when clicked, causes a modal or popup window to be resized to fill the view port. Clicking the icon again restores the window to its original size and position.
        Parameters:
        maximizable - True if the window is maximizable.

      • isMinimizable

        @Component.PropertyGetter(value="minimizable",
                          description="True if the window may be minimized.")
public boolean isMinimizable()
        Returns true if the window may be minimized. A window that is minimizable has an icon that, when clicked, causes a window's body to be hidden. If the window's mode is modal or popup, it will also be resized to a smaller dimension and placed at the lower left corner of the view port. Clicking the icon again restores the window to its original size and position.
        Returns:
        True if the window is minimizable.

      • setMinimizable

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="minimizable",
                          defaultValue="false",
                          description="True if the window may be minimized.")
public void setMinimizable(boolean minimizable)
        Sets whether the window may be minimized. A window that is minimizable has an icon that, when clicked, causes a window's body to be hidden. If the window's mode is modal or popup, it will also be resized to a smaller dimension and placed at the lower left corner of the view port. Clicking the icon again restores the window to its original size and position.
        Parameters:
        minimizable - True if the window is minimizable.

      • setCloseAction

        Parameters:

      • close

        public boolean close()
        Request the window to be closed. Window closure may be prevented if the onCanClose logic returns false.
        Returns:
        True if the window was closed.

      • getOnCanClose

        public BooleanSupplier getOnCanClose()
        Returns the functional interface that determines whether window closure is permitted.
        Returns:
        The functional interface that determines whether window closure is permitted.

      • setOnCanClose

        public void setOnCanClose(boolean canClose)
        Sets whether window closure is permitted using a simple Boolean value. This is a shortcut for calling setOnCanClose(boolean) with a functional interface that returns a fixed Boolean value.
        Parameters:
        canClose - If true, the tab may be closed.

      • setOnCanClose

        public void setOnCanClose(BooleanSupplier onCanClose)
        Sets the functional interface that will determine if window closure is permitted.
        Parameters:
        onCanClose - The functional interface that will determine if window closure is permitted.

      • canClose

        public boolean canClose()
        Invokes the canClose logic and returns the result.
        Returns:
        The result of invoking the canClose logic.

      • modal

        public void modal()
        Opens the window modally.

      • modal

        public void modal(IEventListener closeListener)
        Opens the window modally.
        Parameters:
        closeListener - The event listener to be invoked upon window closure.

      • popup

        public void popup()
        Opens the window as a popup.

      • popup

        public void popup(IEventListener closeListener)
        Opens the window as a popup.
        Parameters:
        closeListener - The event listener to be invoked upon window closure.
